Create Account Link.body:
params := &stripe.AccountLinkParams{
  Account: stripe.String("${1:acct_xxxxxxxxxxxxx}"),
  RefreshURL: stripe.String("${2:https://example.com/reauth}"),
  ReturnURL: stripe.String("${3:https://example.com/return}"),
  Type: stripe.String("${4:account_onboarding}"),
}
al, _ := accountlink.New(params)

Create Customer Balance Transaction.body:
params := &stripe.
  CustomerBalanceTransactionParams{
  Amount: stripe.Int64(${2:-500}),
  Currency: stripe.String(string(stripe.CurrencyUSD)),
  Customer: stripe.String("${1:cus_xxxxxxxxxxxxx}"),
}
bt, _ := customerbalancetransaction.New(params)

Create File.body:
fp, _ := os.Open("${1:/path/to/a/file.jpg}")
params := &stripe.FileParams{
  FileReader: fp,
  Filename: stripe.String("success.png"),
  Purpose: stripe.String(string(stripe.FilePurposeDisputeEvidence)),
}
f, _ := file.New(params)

Create Plan.body:
params := &stripe.PlanParams{
  Amount: stripe.Int64(${1:2000}),
  Currency: stripe.String(string(stripe.CurrencyUSD)),
  Interval: stripe.String("${3:month}"),
  Product: stripe.String("${4:prod_xxxxxxxxxxxxx}"),
}
p, _ := plan.New(params)

List Subscription Item Usage Record Summ.description: List Subscription Item Usage Record Summary

Create Tax Rate.body:
params := &stripe.TaxRateParams{
  DisplayName: stripe.String("${1:VAT}"),
  Description: stripe.String("${2:VAT Germany}"),
  Jurisdiction: stripe.String("${3:DE}"),
  Percentage: stripe.Float64(${4:16.0}),
  Inclusive: stripe.Bool(${5:false}),
}
tr, _ := taxrate.New(params)

Create Topup.body:
params := &stripe.TopupParams{
  Amount: stripe.Int64(${1:2000}),
  Currency: stripe.String(string(stripe.CurrencyUSD)),
  Description: stripe.String("${3:Top-up for Jenny Rosen}"),
  StatementDescriptor: stripe.String("${4:Top-up}"),
}
t, _ := topup.New(params)

Create Transfer.body:
params := &stripe.TransferParams{
  Amount: stripe.Int64(${1:400}),
  Currency: stripe.String(string(stripe.CurrencyUSD)),
  Destination: stripe.String("${3:acct_xxxxxxxxxxxxx}"),
  TransferGroup: stripe.String("${4:ORDER_95}"),
}
t, _ := transfer.New(params)
